title: Clean uninstall help
body: New league client is buggy and I think I need to do a clean uninstall. For the record this doesn't alter my champs, skins, inventory,etc right? I'm assuming that will be still there after the reinstall but I just wanted to double check. Thanks for the help.

replies.body: Your account unlocks are saved on our side so you'll be fine!  You can download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well, which will perform the clean reinstall for you.  What's the issue that you're having specifically?
I hit launch and it starts up a blank screen. Not sure exactly what causes this but I'd assume a clean uninstall will completely patch it.

Gotcha!  A clean reinstall might not fix this.  Black screens usually happen when an unstable connection is failing to download assets.  You'll want to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide instead to troubleshoot whatever is blocking you from reaching our services.  Hope that helps.  :D
